snippet: After a search and inaccurate headlines, he confessed to accidentally shooting his daughter in what a police captain called “a stupid, idiotic act.”
abstract: Maurice Phillips of Philadelphia is charged with third-degree homicide in shooting death of his 4-year-old daughter during careless act with handgun; police say Phillips then tried to put blame on victim's 5-year-old sister.
lead_paragraph: After a search and inaccurate headlines, he confessed to accidentally shooting his daughter in what a police captain called “a stupid, idiotic act.”

headline.main: Father Tried to Blame 5-Year-Old in Killing of 4-Year-Old, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Man Charged With Killing His 4-Year-Old Daughter
